text: Ciudad Universitaria may refer to: ==Universities== *University City of Caracas, the main campus of the Central University of Venezuela *University City of Madrid, a complex that houses Complutense University of Madrid and the Technical University of Madrid *University City of Mexico, the main campus of the National Autonomous University of Mexico *University City of the National University of San Marcos, the main campus of the National University of San Marcos, located in Lima ==Places== *Ciudad Universitaria (Madrid) barrio, Madrid ==Transport== *Ciudad Universitaria railway station, a station in Buenos Aires *Ciudad Universitaria station (Caracas), a station on the Caracas Metro *Ciudad Universitaria (Madrid Metro), a station on the Madrid Metro
title: Ciudad Universitaria
